content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 34, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 50, "index": 40}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft stripped_oak_wood, I need to place 4 stripped_oak_log in a 2x2 grid in the crafting table. Since I have 4 stripped_oak_log in slot 11, I will start by moving one to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 34, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 50, "index": 40}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Since I have already placed one stripped_oak_log in slot 1, I will now place another one to the right of it in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 34, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 50, "index": 40}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I need to place another stripped_oak_log in slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 34, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 50, "index": 40}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I need to place another stripped_oak_log in slot 5, which is below slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 34, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "warped_pressure_plate", "quantity": 55, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_blue_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 19, "index": 35}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 28, "index": 37}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral_block", "quantity": 50, "index": 40}, {"type": "slime_block", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_oak_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
